name: Easy Vegetable Soup II
author: Marilyn
summary: This is a quick, delicious vegetable soup that we've been serving in our family for over 20 years. Great on a cold day, even better the next day!
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, with liquid
1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
directions: In a large pot over high heat, boil the stew meat in enough water to cover the meat completely for 30 minutes, skimming the froth as necessary
Place the potatoes, carrots and onions into the pot, adding water if necessary
Boil for 30 minutes Drain the water but leave enough to cover the meat and vegetables in the pot
Then add the corn, peas, green beans, lima beans, butter beans and tomatoes
Reduce heat to low and let simmer for 1 to 1 1/2 hours
Season with salt and pepper to taste
